codes.RQCL: Responder is requested to close the investigation. All investigation requests relating to the investigation may be disregarded.
codes.RQOB: Responder is requested to review an earlier response as the requestor objects to it.
codes.RQST: Responder is requested to provide the status of the investigation.

description: Specifies the requested action, as published in an external investigation action code set.
name: ExternalInvestigationAction1Code
